name: rate my life
description:
Based on the fairytale "Eisenhans" and inspired by Atari 2600 gamemechanics this schoolproject focuses on telling a story in a reduced symbolic style like Warja Lavater did as an artist creating Leporellos.

If you played it, I would love to have your feedback on it:

https://forms.gle/n9aSPnjDRJcu1JPK9
